allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add multi-article scanner, EAN lookup APIs, accounting exports, and theme system

Scanner multi-articles:
- Queue system for articles scanned without member selected
- Support for all collection types (Jeux, Livres, Films, Disques)
- Auto-flush when member is selected
- Silent error handling in history

EAN Lookup - External APIs:
- ConfigurationAPI model with encryption, rate limiting, statistics
- Support for UPCitemdb, BGG, OpenLibrary, GoogleBooks, TMDB, MusicBrainz
- Admin configuration routes in /api/parametres/apis-externes

Accounting multi-format exports:
- ConfigurationExportComptable model
- Export service with strategy pattern
- Formats: FEC, Sage, Ciel, EBP, Quadra, OpenConcerto, Dolibarr, CSV, JSON
- Configurable account and journal mapping per format
- Routes: /api/export-comptable/formats, /api/export-comptable/export/:format

Theme system:
- ThemeSite model with 26+ color variables per theme
- 7 predefined themes (light and dark modes)
- CSS generation, import/export, duplication
- Admin routes in /api/parametres/themes
- Public routes in /api/public/theme(s)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
